SELECT A1.sessionId, A1.sessionName, A1.localNumber, A1.sessionIp ,A1.dbVersion, A1.appVersion, A2.COMP_NAME as compName FROM (SELECT T1.SESSION_ID AS sessionId, T1.SESSION_NAME AS sessionName, SUBSTRING(T1.REMOTE_TYPE, 5, 6) AS localNumber,T1.SESSION_IP AS sessionIp, COALESCE(SUBSTRING(T2.PRCS_NAME, 11), '-') dbVersion, COALESCE(T2.BUILD_DATE, '-') AS appVersion FROM (SELECT SESSION_ID, SESSION_NAME, REMOTE_TYPE, SESSION_IP FROM PLF_IT_SESSION) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IMP_ID, PRCS_NAME, BUILD_DATE FROM IMP_IT_VERSION WHERE PRCS_NAME LIKE 'BIS_EVT_TS%' ) T2 ON T1.SESSION_ID = T2.IMP_ID) A1 left join IMP_MT_TERMINAL A2 on A1.sessionid = A2.IMP_ID ORDER BY A1.sessionid

mapper.select: SELECT T1.SESSION_ID AS sessionId, T2.SESSION_NAME AS sessionName, MIN(REG_DT) AS firstDate, MAX(REG_DT) AS lastDate, COUNT(*) dataCount FROM IMP_HT_SESSION T1 INNER JOIN PLF_IT_SESSION T2 ON T1.SESSION_ID = T2.SESSION_ID WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN #{ST_DT} AND #{ED_DT} GROUP BY T1.SESSION_ID ORDER BY T1.SESSION_ID
